trans:
- I have to mentioned first that, at that time, before leaving to Nakhon Nayok we had plans to Phu Thap Boek.
- Kik is the one doing the reservation and paid the amount in advance before splitting the cost. The trip was already booked, but got canceled. I was unable to go (but we can reschedule the date), but he scolded me and shouting at me even though called Saofan and get angrily at me.
- Even though it wasn't my fault! Only Saofun and I transferred the money.
- Because the next day is Por's birthday, so we had to change plans to Petchaburi at home. I told everyone to come to have a small gathering.
: About the trip to Nakhon Nayok, in the morning I saw him live streaming, being drunk and didn't sleep yet (Kik believe someone saw the live stream). So I called Fan and ask her what happened. I was going to call her anyway to ask if she's coming to Por's birthday and she said she would come.
